bwwExcerpt: 'The Book of Mormon," the jubilant and expert one-joke Broadway musical by Trey Parker and Matt Stone, is everything you should expect from a show by the heat-seeking rascals of "South Park." What you may not expect, however, is the sweetness.

everything you should expect from a show by the heat-seeking rascals of 'South Park'
What you may not expect, however, is the sweetness
